Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stVPTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements a VP-tree. The VP-tree has the same external interface and behavior of a Metric Tree.

It can perform both range and k-nearest neighbour queries, and so its combinations and variations.

This is a binary static memory metric tree

This class was developed to generate perfect answers to queries. It allows the build of automated test programs for other metric trees implemented by this library.

Author:
Ives Renê Venturini Pola (ives@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Documentation review.
